Title: Amar Akbar Anthony
Writer: Vamsi Rajesh Kondaveeti, Kollipara Praveen (script assistance), Varma Praveen (script assistance), Sreenu Vaitla
Actors: Ileana D'Cruz, Ravi Teja, Divyaa Unni, Abhimanyu Singh
Plot: A man suffering from Dissociative Identity Disorder has to take revenge against four businessmen for the murder of his family while his past confronts him in the form of his childhood love.
